content:
San Francisco offers a wide range of attractions and activities for tourists to enjoy. Here are a few must-see sights and activities you could include in your itinerary:

1. Golden Gate Bridge - The iconic suspension bridge is a must-see for tourists. You could rent a bike and ride across the bridge or take a walk across it for stunning views. 2. Alcatraz Island - Site of the notorious federal prison, Alcatraz is now a popular tourist attraction. You can take a ferry to the island and explore its history. 3. Fisherman's Wharf - A popular area for tourists, Fisherman's Wharf offers many souvenir shops, seafood restaurants, and street performers. 4. The Exploratorium - San Francisco's interactive science museum with hands-on exhibits and activities for all ages. 5. Golden Gate Park - A sprawling park that offers something for everyone, including gardens, museums, lakes, and outdoor activities. 6. Cable Cars - San Francisco's iconic cable cars are a fun and unique way to see the city's sights. 7. Hiking in Lands End - Stunning ocean views can be found in this park that trails the coastline of the western edge of San Francisco. These are just a few suggestions, but there are many more attractions and activities to experience in San Francisco.
